title: Sepulchral Chapel seen through a Colonnade
provenance: Ex collection: Piancastelli and Mrs. Edward D. Brandegee.
medium: Pen and brown ink, brush and brown wash, graphite
description: Horizontal rectangle: view from within an antique building in which sculptural monuments are massed, through an opening between two columns toward large domed building.
name: Drawing
